# replacedBy

**Instance Property**

Optionally, the AppIntent that replaces this one. Note: This is used by the Shortcuts app to help the user find the new AppIntent to use.

## Declaration

```swift
var replacedBy: ReplacementIntent.Type?
```
title: replacedBy
